TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Piyuma, title = Piyuma, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Piyuma} }

S.FORM: Piyuma i Pingtung a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Piyuma. u kasalumaluma' nu Piyuma sa, 168 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 716 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 702 ku tademaw, pakalatu 98%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 14 ku tademaw, pakalatu 2%. u kasabinacadan, Paiwan 93%, Amis 1%, zumazuma 3%.

Piyoma i Pingtong a kowan no Kalinko ko niyazo' no Piyoma. o kasalomaloma' no Piyoma sa, 168 ko loma'. komod no kasabinawlan sa, 716 ko tademawan. kasabinawlan no Ingcomin sa, 702 ko tademaw, pakalato 98%. o zoma sa, cay ko Ingcomin, 14 ko tademaw, pakalato 2%. o kasabinacadan, Paiwan 93%, Amis 1%, zomazoma 3%.
